predicate.note: Frames file for 'symbolize' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Categorization.

roleset.name: act as a representative of a class

example.name: active
example.text: White, 24 years old, a singer in her church choir, she symbolizes a generation that gave its heart and its vote to Ronald Reagan.
example.arg: a generation that gave its heart and its vote to Ronald Reagan

example.name: passive
example.text: The deal was symbolized [*-1] by the restoration of the Shi'ite Sultan Ali Keshtmand to the Afghan prime ministry.
example.arg: the restoration of the Shi'ite Sultan Ali Keshtmand to the Afghan prime ministry

roleset.note: There's a possibility for an agent, hence the lack of Arg0.
